DOC.brief_summary: Double blind placebo controlled trial to evaluate whether the routine use of nasal irrigation with mupirocin is more effective than saline irrigations alone in reducing symptoms of chronic rhinosinusitis in the early postoperative period.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Antibiotic Sinonasal Rinse After Sinus Surgery
DOC.criteria: Chronic Rhinosinusitis Undergoing endoscopic sinus surgery Age under 18 Documented adverse reaction to mupirocin
